component.name: FreeRTOS_IP
component.detail: FreeRTOS-Plus-TCP is a scalable, open source and thread safe TCP/IP stack for FreeRTOS.

component.name: FreeRTOS_Kernel
component.detail: FreeRTOS kernel is a real-time operating system (RTOS) designed for building embedded microcontroller applications.

component.name: LittleFS
component.detail: LittleFS is a lightweight, fail-safe filesystem designed for microcontrollers.

app.name: (Ethernet) Minimal sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates basic TCP/IP functionality using FreeRTOS-Plus-TCP library over Ethernet connection. https://github.com/renesas/iot-reference-rx/blob/main/Configuration/samples/minimal_tcp/README.md

sourceedit.data: (It seems you have created a project for "custom user board", please note that the default settings were verified with CK-RX65N-V2 target board only.)
(You might need to adjust the settings accordingly.)

sourceedit.key: 1 = Sections of the expansion RAM area is enabled.
sourceedit.data: #define BSP_CFG_EXPANSION_RAM_ENABLE (1)

app.name: Secure bootloader sample project
app.description: This demonstration is used together with OTA sample project to provide a secure boot. https://github.com/renesas/iot-reference-rx/blob/main/Configuration/samples/bootloader/README.md

sourceedit.data: (It seems you have created a project for "custom user board", please note that the default settings were verified with CK-RX65N-V2 target board only.)
(You might need to adjust the settings accordingly.)

app.name: (Ethernet) PubSub/MQTT sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates PubSub functionality using AWS services with Ethernet connection. https://github.com/renesas/iot-reference-rx/blob/main/Configuration/samples/common/README.md

sourceedit.key: * (1) : OTA over MQTT demo is enabled
sourceedit.data: #define ENABLE_OTA_UPDATE_DEMO (0)
(It seems you have created a project for "custom user board", please note that the default settings were verified with CK-RX65N-V2 target board only.)
(You might need to adjust the settings accordingly.)

app.name: (Ethernet) PubSub/MQTT with Over-the-air (OTA) update sample project
app.description: This demonstration illustrates PubSub and OTA update functionality (simultaneously) using AWS services with Ethernet connection. Note: This project requires a bootloader project, please create it separately. https://github.com/renesas/iot-reference-rx/blob/main/Configuration/samples/common/README.md

sourceedit.key: * (1) : OTA over MQTT demo is enabled
sourceedit.data: #define ENABLE_OTA_UPDATE_DEMO (1)
(It seems you have created a project for "custom user board", please note that the default settings were verified with CK-RX65N-V2 target board only.)
(You might need to adjust the settings accordingly.)
